Panel Methods

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Generic»GObject. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Align SelectionAligns selected objects. Details
Clear SelectionClears the selection list. Details
Convert Panel To Screen CoordinatesConverts front panel coordinates to screen coordinates. Details
Convert Screen To Panel CoordinatesConverts screen coordinates to front panel coordinates. Details
Copy SelectionCopies objects you select into clipboard. Details
Distribute SelectionDistributes selected objects. Details
Make SelectionSelects the front panel objects you specify in Objects and deselects all other front panel objects. Details
Move Selection BackwardMoves the selected object(s) one step backward in the z-plane order. Details
Move Selection ForwardMoves the selected object(s) one step forward in the z-plane order. Details
Move Selection To BackConverts the coordinates of a point on the screen to front panel window coordinates. Details
Move Selection To FrontConverts the coordinates of a point on the front panel window to screen coordinates. Details
Select AllSelects all objects in the panel. Details
Set Panel OrderSpecifies the order of controls in the panel. Details
